sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; const Contact = () =>{ let [data, setData] = useState({ name : "", father : "", email : "", phone : "", message : "" }) let InputEvent = (event)=>{ const value = event.target.value; const name = event.target.name; setData((prev)=>{ return { ...prev, [name]:value } }) } return( <>

Contact Us {data.name}

) } export default Contact;
